size.title: Size
size.description: Specifies the x/y size of the billboard evaluated every frame

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: Specifies how to calculate the direction of a particle, this will be used by facing modes that require a direction as input (for instance: lookat_direction and direction)

min_speed_threshold.title: Minimum Speed Threshold
min_speed_threshold.description: only used in 'derive_from_velocity' mode. The direction is set if the speed of the particle is above the threshold. The default is 0.01

uv.title: UV
uv.description: Specifies the UVs for the particle

uv.title: UV
uv.description: Assuming the specified texture width and height, use theseAssuming the specified texture width and height, use these uv coordinates.   uv coordinates.

flipbook.title: Flipbook
flipbook.description: A flipbook animation uses pieces of the texture to animate, by stepping over time from one 'frame' to another

stretch_to_lifetime.title: Stretch To Lifetime
stretch_to_lifetime.description: Optional, adjust fps to match lifetime of particle. default=false

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Optional, makes the animation loop when it reaches the end
